title: Moonbird
brief_description: A colour cartoon of the fantasy of childhood. Two small boys, armed with rope, cage and bait, embark upon a night-time expedition to capture the nocturnal bird. A bird does finally appear. Making friends, the boys persuade the bird to go home with them. (Award: Venice)
